validation.validation: To require declaration, ensure that it's a stand-alone program of study that isn't in the Non-Degree Program or Undeclared Program category.

description: Wrapper element for the Program of Study data.

validation.validation: A Program Concentration cannot be required for a non-concentration possible Program of Study.
Enter a First Entry Date that is on or after the Effective Date.
Enter a Last Entry Date that is on or after the First Entry Date.
Effective Date must be on or after the Academic Unit Effective Date.
Enter a First Entry Date that is before the Last Entry Date for the academic unit.
All Locations must have Campus as their usage type.
Primary Program of Study must be different from Secondary Program of Study.
Selected Program Areas cannot share the same Program Area Type.
Ensure that this Program of Study is owned by an Academic Unit with a superior Institution.
Only one of the following may be input: Financial Aid Criteria Program Weeks, Months, Years
Program of Study must specify a Program Duration.
You must make admissions response not required for Fast Path programs of study.
To submit this program of study, ensure that the parent program of study is of a type that’s configured for Concentration Possible.
For an existing Program of Study, ensure that the Owning Academic Unit belongs to the same Institution as before.
Ensure that the owning academic unit level configuration is active when the program of study is active.
Enter a First Entry Date that is on or after the first entry date for the academic unit and level.
You can’t create an earlier version of the program of study if the dates on the adjacent academic years on the current and intended calendar policies aren't consecutive.
You can only set a value for program minimum coursework if the program of study is stand-alone.
Specify either Credit or Clock hours for Program Minimum Coursework, not both.
Please select Route by Owning, Route by Academic Unit or both.
You can't select Inactive Applicant Types for the Allowed Applicant Types prompt.
You can't specify allowed applicant types for this program of study type because it can't accept students for admission.
Ensure that the owning academic unit and level configuration is both active and configured to offer programs as of the First Entry Date of the program of study.
For Default Credentials, specify educational credentials that have an Internal usage.
For Other Available Credentials, specify educational credentials that have an Internal usage.
Specify unique values for Default Credentials and Other Available Credentials.
To specify Grant Single Credential, ensure that Credential Granting is enabled for the program of study type.
Specify only 1 default credential when Grant Single Credential is enabled for the program of study.
Specify at least 1 default credential for the program of study.
To specify Other Available Credentials, ensure that Credential Granting is enabled for the program of study type.
To specify Default Credentials, ensure that Credential Granting is enabled for the program of study type.

You can only assign a new owning academic unit and level if it has an equivalent calendar policy, meaning it must have the same academic calendar, unit type, and typical attendance pattern defined on the policy. Currently, there's a discrepancy between [old AUC] and [new AUC]. You can also configure a calendar policy for this program of study as of [discrepancy date].
